statements: SELECT * FROM product_performance;
SELECT product_name, category, sales_amount FROM product_performance;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM product_performance WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, sales_amount FROM product_performance ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_performance WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, sales_date, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND sales_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY sales_date ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_sales, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM product_performance GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products ORDER BY product_category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM sales INNER JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.sale_amount FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, price FROM products LEFT JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sale_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM product_performance;
SELECT product_name, performance_score FROM product_performance WHERE performance_score > 8;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT report_name, report_data->>'created_by' AS report_creator FROM reports WHERE report_data->>'created_by' = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, performance_score FROM product_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_performance WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT product_name, performance_score FROM product_performance WHERE product_id = 'abc-123'
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING average_sales > 500
SELECT report_name, JSON_EXTRACT(report_data, '$.sales') AS sales_data FROM reports WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(report_data, '{"metrics": ["sales"]}')
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM reports
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE registration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, reviewer_name ASC LIMIT 3;
